Articles.Content:
> 
> Am I allowed to join in? I had an abandoned Constellation project that I ditched 3 months ago, and I's feeling like doing a remake.

Hi, I think anyone can join as long as they are making a stock constellation mission.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T23:14:23Z" title="06/16/2015 11:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by Majorjim**
  
ninja'd

I'll be making everything BUT the two Duna landers stock, so I'll get started. I'll probably post my progress regarding the Duna landers in a separate thread.

EDIT: Maybe I'll try to make the Duna Landers stock...

> 
> Question- MRS, how did you mount the Vernors on the outside of the fairing?

I built the fairings, the added a bunch of cubic struts, then the LFO RCS block.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I'll be making everything BUT the two Duna landers stock, so I'll get started. I'll probably post my progress regarding the Duna landers in a separate thread.
> EDIT: Maybe I'll try to make the Duna Landers stock...

Welcome to the club! You might want a moment to bid a fond farewell to any real life you have. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Looking better?

![myCTIMn.png](http://i.imgur.com/myCTIMn.png)

> 
> Looking better?
> [http://i.imgur.com/myCTIMn.png](http://i.imgur.com/myCTIMn.png)

Hmm, I would change the bright blue border-circle and the font...

Shift Kerbin to the center, and the mun and Duna behind and both in the sides, emphasis on kerbin would be splendid ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So you can have multiple versions of this, if you put Duna on the center, it can be the logo bearer for a duna mission, same goes with the mun...

Note to SHiftER; Too much time on web development...

> 
> Hmm, I would change the bright blue border-circle and the font...
> Shift Kerbin to the center, and the mun and Duna behind and both in the sides, emphasis on kerbin would be splendid ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> So you can have multiple versions of this, if you put Duna on the center, it can be the logo bearer for a duna mission, same goes with the mun...
> 
> Note to SHiftER; Too much time on web development...

Good idea about the border and font, as to planets, I'm thinking of this: [https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/Constellation_logo_white.svg/250px-Constellation_logo_white.svg.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/Constellation_logo_white.svg/250px-Constellation_logo_white.svg.png)

> 
> Good idea about the border and font, as to planets, I'm thinking of this: [https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/Constellation_logo_white.svg/250px-Constellation_logo_white.svg.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/26/Constellation_logo_white.svg/250px-Constellation_logo_white.svg.png)

Oooooh, now that I see it more, it actually fits ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) and try adding a milky-way background, yes?

Note to SHiftER; Skyboxes are quite...

A first draft for my pack logo.

![ybEcqLr.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/ybEcqLr.png?1)

> 
> A first draft for my pack logo.
> [http://i.imgur.com/ybEcqLr.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/ybEcqLr.png?1)

Great work! Mind to accept some suggestions? Are you going for a minimalist nature in design of your logo?

> 
> Great work! Mind to accept some suggestions? Are you going for a minimalist nature in design of your logo?

Go ahead, that's what the thread's for! Yeah, I want to go simple for this logo.

> 
> Go ahead, that's what the thread's for! Yeah, I want to go simple for this logo.

Alright ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, first of all, the blue border like previous, although yours is less brighter and it blends in a tad more ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I recommend you add another border layer, except a darker shade of blue and thinner perhaps ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The red stripes might do better if they didn't abruptly end, and maybe a little more smoother but if the rough bumbpy texture is part of your design, then its green light in sense ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Minimalist on planets, hmm. The planets would be better off having a smoother texture on the sides, and you could basically accomplish their designs by just using various sizes of circle brushes ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Minimalist as it is, you can try scale up the planets to fill in the dead space of black in between, maybe center the planet triad a bit, or you could add a space background in the black ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Now the problem is the dead space that the red stripes create .. . not sure how to approach that.

The text has room for being enlarged. You can experiment with other fonts and see what else can suite you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Note to SHiftER; Your opinion isn't advice...

Here are two more concepts.

![9YcvBgh.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/9YcvBgh.png?1)

![qWlwy2p.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/qWlwy2p.png?1)

My current flag:

![izfPK3M.png](http://i.imgur.com/izfPK3M.png)

I originally wanted to call it "Project Kolonation- Duna" after my original plans for the original Kolonation Duna mission architecture (Based on the constellation one, of course) but since this is a replica and not "Based off", I'll stick with Constellation. The SPR is mostly done, too.

![M6JVEFO.png](http://i.imgur.com/M6JVEFO.png)

![uaSaxox.png](http://i.imgur.com/uaSaxox.png)

And a sneak peak at the habitat lander:

![6WlP0Db.png](http://i.imgur.com/6WlP0Db.png)

Welcome! And things are looking great so far! Keep it up man, it only get harder!

Hello all! As of a first entry in this post i'd like to share a few of my projects. 

I've always looked at the Constellation Program as one of the most ambitious developments of the space career, but sadly it didn't came to good. Today I have for you a few remainings of that idea which I'm excited to share, such as the Orion Space Capsule, the LER (lunar electric rover) and of course the Ares I launcher. Those who remember me may also recall my first iteration of the capsule called ["Project Orion"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75538-Project-Orion%28MPCV%29-The-most-accurate-Orion-vessel-you-probably-have-seen-until-now?p=1071835#post1071835) (which dates from over a year). As of now, the new Orion capsule and the Space Exploration Vehicle platform (aka LER) are ready and fully functional. Not as well though, is the Ares I rocket, which still suffers from minor things such as stabilty and other sort of clipping problems related to the Orion which causes the capsule to not start the main engine. So, I won't bore you anymore, here are some (rushed) pics ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):

* * *

**Ares I**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/bwSZh)

* * *

**Orion MPCV**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/DTRYr)

* * *

**Space Exploration Vehicle**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/9C2Pj)

* * *

P.D: sorry for my english if anything is wrong (I am always worried of not express myself properly), and again, sorry for the rushed images where the "aerodynamic forces overlay" thingy appears. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

P.D. 2: btw no mods used here, all stock. Just got installed Ven's Stock Revamp to make things prettier.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T12:59:30Z" title="06/18/2015 12:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by Dieguscus**

Not as well though, is the Ares I rocket, which still suffers from minor things such as stabilty and other sort of clipping problems related to the Orion which causes the capsule to not start the main engine. Quite nice ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) My suggestion is to just eliminate the excess space in the triangles, by scaling it down a bit ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Note to SHiftER; Excess space, we already have that up there.
Ahh! The burns are so slow! How are you getting around that? My TWR with the crew lander is something like .18.

> 
> *Hello all! As of a first entry in this post i'd like to share a few of my projects.* 
> *I've always looked at the Constellation Program as one of the most ambitious developments of the space career, but sadly it didn't came to good. Today I have for you a few remainings of that idea which I'm excited to share, such as the* Orion Space Capsule*, the* LER *(lunar electric rover) and of course the* Ares I *launcher. Those who remember me may also recall my first iteration of the capsule called* ["Project Orion"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75538-Project-Orion%28MPCV%29-The-most-accurate-Orion-vessel-you-probably-have-seen-until-now?p=1071835#post1071835) *(which dates from over a year). As of now, the new Orion capsule and the Space Exploration Vehicle platform (aka LER) are ready and fully functional. Not as well though, is the Ares I rocket, which still suffers from minor things such as stabilty and other sort of clipping problems related to the Orion which causes the capsule to not start the main engine. So, I won't bore you anymore, here are some (rushed) pics* *:*

Could you show us without Ven's Stock Part Revamp?

High speed reentry!

![qloWccF.png](http://i.imgur.com/qloWccF.png)

What are you guys going to do with the crew lander, propulsive capture, or something else?

> What are you guys going to do with the crew lander, propulsive capture, or something else?

It doesn't circularize I don't think so my aim will have to be spot on. I will aerobrake at interplanetary speed.

Most likely a mixture of aerocapture and prop braking.

Also:

[![screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png.html)

> 
> Most likely a mixture of aerocapture and prop braking.
> Also:
> 
> http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png.html[http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot5076_zps28btxhtr.png)

OOOH! Is that the Hab lander? I spy seperatrons. Do they blast off the panels to release the hab module? Also, cool that you have the SPR at 90 degrees to the lander, but how are you going to get it out?
It can rove itself out, and yes the seps blast off the panels to release DAVE (Duna Ascent Vehicle).
